summary: The diff primarily adds/updates global CSS splash animation keyframes and updates the Internet Identity hook; it does not show concrete, app-wide button-style reversion across all pages nor the full restoration of the Splash/Onboarding card transition motion/layering behavior to a pre-Calendar baseline.

missing_requirements.requirement: Revert ALL app buttons to the styling and interaction behavior that existed before the Calendar feature was implemented (sizes, borders, shadows, hover/active/disabled states, typography) across Splash/Onboarding, Welcome, Home, Camera, Moments, Calendar, and Settings; ensure Calendar-specific button styles do not leak globally.
missing_requirements.reason: Only a portion of global CSS is shown, and the diff does not provide evidence of specific button style/interaction changes across the listed pages/components or scoping fixes to prevent Calendar styles from impacting other buttons.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore Splash/Onboarding slide card motion/animations to the exact pre-Calendar behavior (transition timing/easing/direction, layering/z-index, pointer-events correctness, and per-card content entrance animations).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows added/updated CSS keyframes/classes for some entrance/transition animations, but it does not show changes to the slideshow/card transition implementation (likely in the Splash/Onboarding component) needed to ensure timing/easing/direction, layering, and pointer-events behavior match the pre-Calendar state.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity hook behavior changes (e.g., delegation validity handling / cross-browser compatibility adjustments).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is strictly about reverting global button styling regressions and restoring splash slide card motion; it explicitly states no backend work and does not request auth-flow modifications.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of project state metadata file.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asks for adding project documentation/state files; request is limited to UI regression reverts.
